articles.author: Mario Hawat
articles.description: The fourth and final episode of the GSoC 2021 overview series, taking a look at projects dealing with physics in Blender.
articles.title: GSoC Roundup Episode Four: Let’s Get Physical

articles.author: Mario Hawat
articles.description: The third part of the GSoC 2021 roundup series, this time overviewing projects upgrading two of Blender's powerful modelling workflows: Curves and the Knife tool.
articles.title: GSoC Roundup Episode Three: Ahead of the Curve, On the Cutting Edge

articles.author: Mario Hawat
articles.description: The second part of the GSoC 2021 roundup series, this time overviewing projects tackling two of Blender's powerful editors: The UV Editor and the VSE.
articles.title: GSoC Roundup Episode Two: Editorial Endeavours

articles.author: Hans Goudey
articles.description: Developer Hans Goudey shares the results of the geometry nodes curve project, and future goals.
articles.title: Procedural Curves in 3.0 and Beyond

articles.author: Curtis Holt
articles.description:
Curtis Holt writes: Hi everyone! In this video, I'll be giving you a sneak peek of version 9 of the free BY-GEN generative modeling addon for Blender. This version will feature full geometry nodes integration allowing for a seemingly limitless number of surface styles. I'll talk about the planned features including a new content pack [...]
Source
articles.title: BY-GEN V9 Is Coming with Full Geometry Nodes Integration

articles.author: Bart
articles.description:
Here's an overview of the most recent Blender jobs on Blender Artists: [PAID] Mid-Senior 3D Animation artist needed for CPG company ZERO ONE: Mid-Senior Blender artists required For more jobs, look here.
Source
articles.title: Blender Jobs for October 14, 2021

articles.author: Mr3D
articles.description:
Mr3D writes: Hi Friends, I have a tutorial on how to use Physical Starlight & Atmosphere add-on so make sure to check it out.
Source
articles.title: How to use the Physical Starlight And Atmosphere add-on [$]

articles.author: Lane Wallace
articles.description:
Lane Wallace writes: Easily create a realistic Rubik's Cube.  
Source
articles.title: Very Real Rubik's Cube (Blender Tutorial)

articles.author: Mario Hawat
articles.description:
Blender's revolutionary Grease Pencil toolset is steadily spreading and gaining momentum among artists and studios alike, a phenomenon that increasingly leads to the constant discovery of beautiful artwork and productions made with GP. Daniel Martínez Lara just shared one such example by artist and director Ryo Timo working at Studio Daisy. Just dicovered these beatifull [...]
Source
articles.title: Check Out Beautiful Grease Pencil Shorts by Studio Daisy

articles.author: Abby Crawford
articles.description:
About Hi, my name is Daniel Chong, I am a concept artist based in Malaysia with some past experience in architectural visualisation. My interest in digital art really came in the final year of architecture school when I took an elective module called 3D and Animated Design, which gave me a small insight into the [...]
Source
articles.title: Meet the Artist: Daniel Chong

articles.author: Jan van den Hemel
articles.description:
Jan van den Hemel writes: Using Rust, Dust or Dirt is a good way to blend two different materials and objects together. We can achieve this by using the Ambient Occlusion node, both in Cycles and Eevee.
Source
articles.title: Blend materials with Rust and Dust

articles.author: Leo-MediaWay
articles.description:
Leo from MediaWay writes: I thought it would be fun to do a super creepy Halloween Projection map this year! So, armed with my trusty projector, and Blender (of course!), I set out to make the scariest projection in the neighborhood! Zombies from Mixamo, house destruction with Rbdlabs. Hope you enjoy it!
Source
articles.title: Halloween Projection Mapping with Blender

articles.author: Bart
articles.description:
Here's an overview of the most recent Blender jobs on Blender Artists: Help us work out how to align this base mesh with this 3D scan! [PAID]_Openings for Blender Animators & Lighting Artists Rig this dumb hotdog. 3D Artist for anime model Animated Pixel Artist needed 3-D Model needed for Art Gallery Looking for Animator [...]
Source
articles.title: Blender Jobs for October 13, 2021

articles.author: 3D Tudor
articles.description:
3D Tudor writes: Blender Bevel Modifier Not Working The first installment of a possibly a new series aimed at troubleshooting problems within Blender. This one covers the Bevel Modifier and how to fix it when it doesn't work. Thanks all for checking it out :)
Source
articles.title: Blender Bevel Modifier Not Working

articles.author: Jennifer Abbott
articles.description:
Jennifer Abbott writes: In this shader tutorial I will show you how I made a jade material in Blender. Timeline: 00:00 Introduction 00:13 Jade Shader  
Source
articles.title: How to make a jade material

articles.description: 有童鞋问为什么博客断更这么？其实最近忙于换工作，到了新公司得表现的积极一些！所以后面更新肯对非常慢了！ 前几天有个同事反应情况说：CentOS服务器 pip突然不好使了？提示证书有问题。当时解决方案是，使用了其他的pip国内镜像！ [cra ...
articles.title: Let’s Encrypt 根证书过期，导致pip使用清华镜像不信任
